system.description:
Upon reaching 1,400,000 experience points, a Dwarf gains an innate resistance to magic, reducing the damage they take from spells and certain magical effects. This resistance applies to all damage-causing spells and spell-like effects, including those from magical items and special abilities of monsters (such as a beholder’s eye rays). However, it does not apply to dragon breath attacks.

Damage Reduction

  • When subjected to a damage-dealing spell or magical effect, the Dwarf automatically takes only half damage. The total damage rolled is divided by 2, rounding down.
  • If the effect allows a saving throw, a successful save further reduces the damage to one-quarter of the total rolled. In this case, divide the damage by 4, rounding down.

Minimum Damage Rule

  • If the final damage calculation results in ½ a point or less, the Dwarf instead takes 1 point of damage.

This ability reflects the Dwarves' natural toughness and resistance to arcane forces, making them incredibly resilient against hostile magic.
